elements.title: Jimmy Carter (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Jimmy Carter reported that he had seen a UFO?

elements.title: Craft Horizons (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Craft Horizons both documented and shaped the changing history of the American craft movement?

elements.title: Wolfgang Anheisser (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Wolfgang Anheisser was the leading baritone at the Cologne Opera while simultaneously a member of East Berlin's State Opera?

elements.title: 4,7-dichloroquinoline (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the availability of the chemical intermediate 4,7-dichloroquinoline facilitated the discovery of hydroxychloroquine in 1949?

elements.title: Time Warner Center (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the apartments and hotel rooms at Time Warner Center did not have internet from Time Warner because it was too expensive?
